events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but it doesn't fit me at all. I would like to request a refund since I cannot use the product.
The customer's request has been identified as a refund case based on their message about returning an ill-fitting jacket.
Assigned the refund specialist team to handle the case and ensure the customer receives assistance promptly.
Hello, thank you for contacting us about your jacket. I am here to help you with the refund process. Could you please provide your order number?
To proceed with your refund, we will need the order number and a photo of the jacket to verify the condition.
Sure, my order number is 987654321. I have attached a photo showing the jacket in its original condition as requested.
Thank you for the information. We will process your refund within 5-7 business days after we receive the returned jacket.
That sounds good, I appreciate the quick response and clear instructions for the refund process.
We have arranged a return shipping label for you and once we receive the jacket, your refund will be issued immediately.
Just following up to confirm if you have returned the jacket and received your refund as expected.
Yes, I sent the jacket back yesterday and I have already received confirmation that my refund was processed. Thank you for your assistance.
We are happy to hear your refund was successfully processed. Closing this case. Please contact us if you need any further assistance.
